Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Randolph/Stetson
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker due to, street blockage near Randolph/Stetson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker due to, street blockage near Randolph/Stetson.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains at Western
ShortDescription: Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended at Western due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended at Western due to police activity.

Shuttle buses are available between Kedzie and 35th/Archer to provide connecting service for Western.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
